requireTemporaryPasswordDuringEnrollment.description: Whether a temporary password is required during enrollment

fromEmailAddressForTemporaryPassword.description: Email address used as the sender for temporary password emails

shouldHideLoginStepsControlDuringEnrollm.description: Whether to hide the login steps control during enrollment

minimumEnrollmentAgeIsRequired.description: Whether a minimum enrollment age is required

minimumEnrollmentAgeInYears.description: Minimum age required for enrollment in years

loginPageUrlForOao.description: Login page URL for Online Account Opening

oaoAutoEnrollment.description: Settings for Online Account Opening auto-enrollment

hideConfirmationPage.description: Whether to hide the confirmation page during OAO auto-enrollment

sendUsernameAndPasswordEnabled.description: Whether sending username and password during OAO auto-enrollment is enabled
